scripts.write-google-credentials-file: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const fp = './google-credentials.json'; fs.writeFileSync(fp, process.env.GOOGLE_CREDENTIALS || 'check the Railway env variable for GOOGLE_CREDENTIALS');"
scripts.build: npm run write-google-credentials-file && NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client && npm install --prefix server && npm run build --prefix server
